name: Quaptos
overview: Quaptos is a puzzle board game. The goal of the game is to arrange an identical pattern in the second window. The screen is divided into two parts. The first window shows a pattern, which must be repeated in the second window. Every square brick has a digit on it - initially "one". Each placed next to it brick increases the number by one point. This is an unofficial conversion of a 1995 Amiga game of the same name, although the board layouts are slightly different.
